name: Dungeon Of Keys
description:
Dungeon Of Keys is a dungeon crawler where your quest is to find three keys to unleash the bloodthirsty beast!

Use arrow keys or WASD keys to move. Use your mouse to aim and left click to shoot, and right click to attack. Find three *keys* to unlock the boss level.

Press the button in the upper-right corner to select a random sprite sheet (this will happen asynchronously).

Tools Used:
- Eclipse (Java)
- Java Image Processing (http://www.jhlabs.com/ip/blurring.html)
- PAINT.NET
- SoundHelix
- BFXR
